parameters.description:
limit is a maximum number of responses to return for a list call. Default and maximum value of the limit is 50.
If more items exist, the server will set the `continue` field on the list metadata to a value that can be used with the same initial query to retrieve the next set of results.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: offset is the next index number from which the response will start. The response offset value can be used along with continue token for the pagination.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: continue token to paginate the subsequent data items
parameters.name: continue

v1ArchType.description: Architecture type of the edge host

createTimestamp.description: CreationTimestamp is a timestamp representing the server time when this object was created.

password.description: The user's password to authenticate user for system login

username.description: The username of the user trying to do system login

cores.description: Cpu cores defines the number of cpu cores on the edge host.

stages.description: base64 encoded cloud init stages in yaml format

v1ClusterConfiguration.description: v1ClusterConfiguration is the configuration required to create a cluster.

name.description: Name of the cluster node pool.

v1ClusterNodePoolSpec.description: ClusterNodePool provides details about cluster node pool.

registrationToken.description: Token used to authenticate pairing request to palette

v1ClusterPairInfoResponse.description: Cluster Pair Info received from palette

registrationToken.description: Token used to authenticate pairing request to palette

verified.description: whether all cluster hosts can connect to palette

v1ClusterProfileConfiguration.description: v1ClusterProfileConfiguration is the configuration required to update a cluster's profiles.

v1ClusterSpec.description: ClusterSpec is the specification of the cluster.

v1ClusterStatus.description: ClusterStatus provides the status of the cluster.

message.description: Human readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one word reason for the condition's last transition.

category.description: Name of the parent category for the conditions list.

conditionsOrder.description: Order or sequence of all the conditions in this category.

order.description: Order or sequence of the category in comparison to all the categories.
Order or sequence of the condition in comparison to all the conditions.

reason.description: Unique, one word reason for the condition's last transition.

v1Configuration.description: Configuration status of the edge host.

creationTimestamp.description: CreationTimestamp is the timestamp when the resource was created.

v1Disk.description: Disk is the specification of the disks on the edge host.

v1EdgeHostInfo.description: EdgeHostInfo is the information about the edge host.

v1EdgeHostSpec.description: EdgeHostSpec is the specification of the edge host.

v1EdgeHostStatus.description: EdgeHostStatus is the status of the edge host.

v1EdgeNativeCloudConfig.description: EdgeNativeCloudConfig is the Schema for the edgenativecloudconfigs API

v1EdgeNativeCloudConfigSpec.description: EdgeNativeCloudConfigSpec defines the desired state of EdgeNativeCloudConfig

v1EdgeNativeClusterConfig.description: EdgeNativeClusterConfig defines Edge Native Cluster specific Spec

controlPlaneEndpoint.description: ControlPlaneEndpoint is the control plane endpoint, which can be an IP or FQDN

ntpServers.description: NTPServers is a list of NTP servers to use instead of the machine image's default NTP server list

overlayNetworkConfiguration.description: OverlayNetworkConfiguration is the configuration for the overlay network

sshKeys.description: SSHKeys specifies a list of ssh authorized keys to access the vms as a 'spectro' user

staticIp.description: StaticIP indicates if IP allocation type is static IP. DHCP is the default allocation type

v1EdgeNativeClusterSettings.description: EdgeNativeClusterSettings defines Edge Native Cluster specific settings

ntpServers.description: NTPServers is a list of NTP servers to use instead of the machine image's default NTP server list

sshKeys.description: SSHKeys specifies a list of ssh authorized keys to access the vms as a 'spectro' user

ddnsSearchDomain.description: DDNSSearchDomain is the search domain used for resolving IP addresses when the EndpointType is DDNS. This search domain is appended to the generated Hostname to obtain the complete DNS name for the endpoint. If Host is already a DDNS FQDN, DDNSSearchDomain is not required

IsCandidateCaption.description: Is Edge host nominated as candidate

hostAddress.description: HostAddress is a FQDN or IP address of the Host

hostUid.description: HostUid is the ID of the EdgeHost

networkInfo.description: List network interfaces of an EH

nodeInfo.description: node information if edgehost is part of a cluster

twoNodeCandidatePriority.description: Set the edgehost candidate priority as primary or secondary, if the edgehost is nominated as two node candidate

additionalTags.description: AdditionalTags is an optional set of tags to add to resources managed by the provider, in addition to the ones added by default. For eg., tags for EKS nodeGroup or EKS NodegroupIAMRole

isControlPlane.description: whether this pool is for control plane

labels.description: labels for this pool, example: master/worker, gpu, windows

maxSize.description: max size of the pool, for scaling

minSize.description: min size of the pool, for scaling

nodeRepaveInterval.description: Minimum number of seconds a node should be Ready, before the next node is selected for repave. Applicable only for workerpools in infrastructure cluster

osType.description: the os type for the pool, must be supported by the provider

size.description: size of the pool, number of machines

updateStrategy.description: rolling update strategy for this machinepool if not specified, will use ScaleOut

useControlPlaneAsWorker.description: if IsControlPlane==true && useControlPlaneAsWorker==true, then will remove master taint this will not be used for worker pools

cidr.description: CIDR is the CIDR of the overlay network

enable.description: Enable is a flag to enable overlay network

addresses.description:
Addresses is a map of PCI device entry name to its addresses.
Example entry would be "11:00.0 VGA compatible controller [0300]: NVIDIA
Corporation Device [10de:1eb1] (rev a1)"- > 0000_11_00_0" The address is
BDF (Bus Device Function) identifier format seperated by underscores. The
first 4 bits are almost always 0000. In the above example 11 is Bus, 00
is Device,0 is function. The values of these addreses are expected in hexadecimal
format

model.description: Model is the model of GPU, for a given vendor, for eg., TU104GL [Tesla T4]

vendor.description: Vendor is the GPU vendor, for eg., NVIDIA or AMD

v1HardwareSpec.description: HardwareSpec is the specification of the hardware of the edge host.

v1Health.description: Health provides details about the resource health.

path.description: A path to the pointer on which operation will be done

value.description: The value to be used within the operations.

v1LifecycleEvents.description: events representing lifecycle of cluster and edge host

contentSyncStatus.description: content sync status for the edge host

errorMessage.description: The error message in case of failure

peers.description: The list of peers linked to the edge host

status.description: The status of the link operation

interval.description: The refresh interval for the link token in seconds

remainingTime.description: The remaining time for the current link token to be valid in seconds

token.description: The link token to link the edge host in base64 encoded format

v1ListMetaData.description: ListMeta describes metadata for the resource listing

continue.description: Next token for the pagination. Next token is equal to empty string indicates end of result set.

offset.description: The next offset for the pagination. Starting index for which next request will be placed.

IsFirstLogin.description: Flag to indicate if the user is logging in for the first time

archType.description: Architecture type of the pool. Default value is 'amd64'

edgeHostToken.description: Edge host token. Required for remote management

v1MetaData.description: MetaData defines the metadata for the resource.

creationTimestamp.description: CreationTimestamp is the timestamp when the resource was created.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier of the resource.

lastModifiedTimestamp.description: LastModifiedTimestamp is the timestamp when the resource was last modified.

name.description: Name is the name of the resource.

tags.description: Tags is the list of tags associated with the resource.

interfaces.description: Mapping of interface names to their configuration

type.description: Type of network interface (e.g., static, dhcp)

v1Nic.description: Nic is the specification of the network interface card on the edge host.

v1ObjectMeta.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have, which includes all objects users must create.

v1ObjectReference.description: ObjectReference contains enough information to let you inspect or modify the referred object.

fieldPath.description: If referring to a piece of an object instead of an entire object, this string should contain a valid JSON/Go field access statement, such as desiredState.manifest.containers[2]. For example, if the object reference is to a container within a pod, this would take on a value like: "spec.containers{name}" (where "name" refers to the name of the container that triggered the event) or if no container name is specified "spec.containers[2]" (container with index 2 in this pod). This syntax is chosen only to have some well-defined way of referencing a part of an object.

kind.description: Kind of the referent. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

name.description: Name of the referent. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

namespace.description: Namespace of the referent. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/namespaces/

resourceVersion.description: Specific resourceVersion to which this reference is made, if any. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#concurrency-control-and-consistency

uid.description: UID of the referent. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#uids

v1Partition.description: Partition is the specification of the partitions on the disk.

newPassword.description: The new password which will be set for the user

oldPassword.description: The old password which is required to authenticate the user

targetPort.description: number or string of the target port .

encodedPassword.description: Whether the password is encoded (optional, defaults to false)

insecure.description: Whether to allow insecure registry connections (optional)

v1RelatedObject.description: The object for which the event is related

v1Service.description: ClusterService provides details about services in cluster.

key.description: The taint key to be applied to a node

value.description: The taint value corresponding to the taint key.

v1Time.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

v1UpdateStrategy.description: UpdatesStrategy will be used to translate to RollingUpdateStrategy of a MachineDeployment We'll start with default values for the translation, can expose more details later Following is details of parameters translated from the type ScaleOut => maxSurge=1, maxUnavailable=0 ScaleIn => maxSurge=0, maxUnavailable=1

type.description: update strategy, either ScaleOut or ScaleIn if empty, will default to RollingUpdateScaleOut

fileName.description: Name of last uploaded content archive file

sha256Hash.description: Hash of last uploaded content archive file

sizeInBytes.description: Size of last uploaded content archive file in bytes

sizeInGiB.description: Size of last uploaded content archive file in GiB

sizeInMiB.description: Size of last uploaded content archive file in MiB

disablePasswordUpdate.description: Flag to indicate if the user is allowed to update the password

Authorization.description: The token granting the authorization access to the user

v1ValidateVariables.description: v1 Validate Variables is for validating the variables

Authorization.description: JWT authorization token obtained using /v1/users/default/login API
Authorization.name: Authorization
